CustomField.description: Formula field that prints an associated code based on the value selected in the ampi__IATI_Collaboration_Type__c field
CustomField.formula: CASE(ampi__IATI_Collaboration_Type__c, "Bilateral",1, "Multilateral (inflows)",2, "Bilateral, core contributions to NGOs and other private bodies / PPPs",3, "Multilateral outflows",4, "Private sector outflows",6, "Bilateral, ex-post reporting on NGOsâ€™ activities funded through core contributions",7, "Bilateral, triangular co-operation",8,null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The code associated with the collaboration involved in the activity's disbursements, e.g. bilateral or multilateral.
CustomField.label: IATI Collaboration Type Code
